rdf:Description.dc:title: Code of practice for small fish farms and fish processing plants 1997
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environmental Protection.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Alberta Government Library*The move to Codes of Practice does not affect the full range of prevention and enforcement response tools available under the Environmental Protection and Enhancement Act to respond to non-compliance. All operations under a Code of Practice will continue to be inspected by Alberta Environment.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Fishery processing industries
Fishery law and legislation
Fishery processing industries
Fish culture
